"Murriah": "You see, I am also from Aelio. I've heard about you, and all of your amazing accomplishments."
"I was quite eager to come here to Retem as well... It was night. We were surrounded by Alters."
"They were much tougher than I ever imagined, and they were nocturnal fiends."
"It was a truly harrowing experience. My partner was even injured. I haven't been able to get the horrid scene out of my head ever since..."
"Just the thought of them attacking turns my legs to jelly... It is truly a most pitiable story."
"So, what do you say to taking them out in my stead?"
"I understand, it's something I should do myself... But I just can't. That's why I've asked you."
